New Records: Liam Livingstone scored 87 off 47 deliveries, including five sixes and six fours on his 50th T20
Key Match Events: Liam Livingstone and Jacob Bethell's 90-run partnership in 47 balls broke the back of the chase
Livingstone carried England to the brink of victory with a superb 87 off 47 deliveries
Matthew Short took a five-wicket haul, his maiden professional five-for
Adil Rashid steered to backward point for the single England needed for a three-wicket win
Post-Match Reflections: England levelled the T20 series against Australia with a three-wicket win
The match set the stage for a decider in south London on Sunday
Miscellaneous Highlights: Phil Salt was initially watchful at the outset of the reply but then belted three successive leg-side sixes off Aaron Hardie
Sean Abbott silenced the crowd with two wickets in three balls
The match was played at Cardiff
